Articles.Content:
My son and I were very disappointed that this setup didn't work as expected:

Jebediah walked away unscathed after five whole minutes of crisping. Actually, the engine blew him gently off the top of the pod as soon as he stood up. Seconds later, the chair exploded.

So unrealistic.
I tried something simmular to this...only difference was it was actually 16 large solid fuel boosters.
It worked better if you have a Kerbal on the ground, with a mainsail going just above him.

You evil evil man... you've given Jebediah CANCER!

*** Now starting the "Save Jebediah" fund, please donate ***

You evil evil man... you've given Jebediah CANCER!

*** Now starting the "Save Jebediah" fund, please donate ***

Given how fast Kerbals can reproduce (they seem to have a limitless supply of them), I think it might be fair to describe Kerbals themselves as a cancer. Also, for all we know Kerbals aren't affected by radiation.

Were you trying to fry him?

They're more or less fire proof at the moment.

Bob wasn't bothered in the slightest. But then, he was suffering that glitch where a kerbal gets stuck in the one pose, so nothing could've bothered him.

Maybe once reentry heating is in...

Edited June 14, 2013 by Tw1
To OP. Have you heard of the Kerbal Mass Relay? It's pretty much just a Mainsail in space that is used to propel your kerbal to ungodly speeds. You should try it sometime.
Serious props. This is now my desktop.
Jebediah will die. I think if you are 10 minutes of radiation flames, you will die. but not frie.(my fantasy has gotten me)
yes, have had Kerbals walk away unscathed after sitting in the flames of 6 Mainsails lighting up right over their heads.
What the heck are those space suits made out of?
I think you shouldn't try this with jeb, the man's too crazy to be bothered by such a silly little thing as a nuke above his head.

What the heck are those space suits made out of?

They're covered in Jebediah's patented magical everything retardant paste!
It has been said before, but thank god that..
